Name: Nova-Life: Amboise
About the game: Nova-Life is a simulation video game mainly focused on city roleplay in an open world. THE FIRST FRENCH ROLEPLAY GAME! In Nova-Life you can create your own character, find a job and go to work to gain money. The Nova-Life project will have around ten dozen or so jobs in its final version, including the possibility of becoming a self-entrepreneur in order to create your own store, and/or your own company which will offer a wide range of choices in the roleplay. The roleplay of Nova-Life is a French roleplay, without doubts as we are developing it along, we will add American, German, Russian maps to vary the roleplays but we will also rely on the players of Nova-Life to vary the content with the Steam Workshop! Features A pleasant driving system Written communication and VO-IP Interact with AI Multiple vehicles The jobs have a level hierarchy, which allows you to get a rank in your job and therefore increase your salary Discord TeamNova : (French)
